alert.note: Alert for Darke; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN SHELBY, DARKE AND NORTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Newport to Union City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Winds may arrive well ahead of any rain. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Piqua, Greenville, Versailles, Covington, Newport, Bradford, Union City, Fort Loramie, Pleasant Hill, Ansonia, Hardin, Webster, Russia, Gettysburg, Port Jefferson, Osgood, North Star, Rossburg and Lockington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
